name: Right Knight (pplgg)
description:
The only path forward, is the one you create.

You play as D, a rogue knight with no tale to tell. In order to go down in history, it's up to you to help them make one. Deep within the depths of a mysterious dungeon, this knight grabs their sword and shield with the lone will to escape. Traverse through the hazardous halls of a crumbling dungeon. Lead D to the Scroll Of Lost Memories by using your remaining willpower to create pathways across deadly gaps. Become the knight you choose to be, with multiple conquests to discover. Even the little things can change the outcome of this knight's story.

  • Each level & item placed in this ever-expanding dungeon has a dash of RNG, so you must create Strategic Paths in order to progress.
  • Unique Platformer Controls limit your movement and require you to think on your feet.
  • Based on how you play as a knight, you'll soon find that there are Achievements & Hidden Lore for you to discover. Can you find them all?

Controls:
Move = ASD
Jump = W, [Space], K
Attack = J

Spawn = Hold N
Cancel = K
Sacrifice = H
